title: Stephen Miran: Senate confirms Trump pick to Fed board ahead of key interest rate vote
description: His entry has raised concerns over the Fed's independence, following Trump's bid to reshape the central bank.
content:
The US Senate has cleared President Donald Trump's pick Stephen Miran to join the Federal Reserve's board of governors - part of a panel responsible for setting the country's interest rates.
Miran, who is chair of the Council of Economic Advisers, wi... [2086 chars]

title: Why Trump's UK state visit is mired with potential pitfalls
description: Months of preparations have gone into the state visit - but the Lord Mandelson question is not the only concern troubling insiders.
content:
US President Donald Trump's state visit to the United Kingdom this week will be no stranger to controversy, just as his first was six years ago.

title: Starmer aide’s exit over lewd Abbott jokes deepens crisis as Trump arrives
description: Labour MPs talk openly about replacing PM, as third senior ally in two weeks departs after publication of messages
content:
The crisis engulfing Keir Starmer has deepened on the eve of Donald Trump’s visit to the UK after the resignation of a third senior ally in two weeks raised further questions about the stability of his government.

title: Thomas Partey could play for Villarreal at Tottenham on eve of court hearing
description: Thomas Partey is scheduled to appear at Southwark crown court on Wednesday to answer rape charges after his new club, Villarreal, start their Champions League campaign at Tottenham on Tuesday
content:
Thomas Partey is scheduled to appear at Southwark crown court on Wednesday morning to answer rape charges – after his new club, Villarreal, kick off their Champions League campaign at Tottenham on Tuesday night.

title: Charlie Kirk suspect ‘confessed to killing in group chat’ before arrest
description: Tyler Robinson allegedly wrote to friends on Discord that ‘it was me’ and that he was sorry ‘for all of this’ shortly before he turned himself in
content:
On Monday JD Vance, the vice-president, hosted a special episode of The Charlie Kirk Show podcast.
